channel.title: Comments on: New Opportunities
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Derek Morris
item.dc:creator: Derek Morris
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations on your new position (sorta new?) You are a terrific asset for them to have, and I am sure you will bring great things to the brewery.

Does this mean if I come to Wisconsin to visit, you can get me free beer?

item.title: By: SQLArcher
item.dc:creator: SQLArcher
item.description: Congratulations on the move, hope that you enjoy the new challenges!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations on the move, hope that you enjoy the new challenges!

item.title: By: Eric Selje
item.dc:creator: Eric Selje
item.content:encoded:
Oh, you’re Canadian! I thought you were a content delivery network!

Congrats! Please bring samples to all future PASS/SQL Saturday meetings. Call them “Unit Tests.”
